title: Nick Perdomo To the Power of 2
itunes:title: Nick Perdomo To the Power of 2
description: Amid some sever technical problems the boys power through and still manage to pull off and interview with Nick Perdomo and then with Nick Perdomo. The first is the CEO of Perdomo Cigars and the second in Nick the 3rd trying to learn the business from the ground up. The sound may not be great but the show is action packed for sure!
